name: @atomic-ehr/codegen
description: TypeScript code generation tools for FHIR resources and type schemas

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --splitting --external typescript
scripts.example:create: bun run src/cli/index.ts typeschema create hl7.fhir.r4.core@4.0.1 -o types/r4.ndjson -v
scripts.example:validate: bun run src/cli/index.ts typeschema validate types/r4.ndjson -v
scripts.example:merge: bun run src/cli/index.ts typeschema merge types/*.ndjson -o types/merged.ndjson -v
scripts.example:generate: bun run src/cli/index.ts generate typescript -i types/r4.ndjson -o types/generated -v
scripts.dev:create: bun run src/cli/index.ts typeschema create -o types/dev.ndjson
scripts.dev:generate: bun run src/cli/index.ts generate typescript -i types/dev.ndjson
scripts.dev:full: bun run dev:create && bun run dev:generate
scripts.example:config-init: bun run src/cli/index.ts config init --template typescript
scripts.demo:full: bun run example:create && bun run example:validate && bun run example:generate
scripts.demo:config: bun run example:config-init && bun run example:config-validate && bun run example:config-show

author: Atomic EHR Team
